description: This file defines the main container React component 'App' for the stock growth analyzer frontend. It manages state for search results, warnings, and errors, and handles the submission of search payloads to the backend API. The component renders the UI, including form, error/warning messages, and a results table.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: React functional component that handles search submission, state management, and rendering of the stock growth analysis UI.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function that calls 'analyzeGrowth' with the search payload, updates state based on response or error.
